name: Lost In The Maze (Beta Demo)
description:
*FORMERLY CALLED DEEP DOWN*

Lost In The Maze is a horror game that puts you in a maze with a creature. This creature will hunt you down so you have to move fast. You must escape the maze and find out how you got there.

IMPORTANT!!!

Please note that this is a beta, it will have bugs and glitches. Please report them to us so we can fix these for later versions. This is not a final representation, the final product will be different.
